author: billbarker
msg: Further attempts to get Gump to build.
This patch is truely horrifying.  Please remove all small children from the room :(.

At this point I'm +1 for excluding this file until it gets a proper maintainer.  It only adds some additional JMX-configuration options to mod_jk2.  Removing it doesn't effect any normal configuration.
